snippet: A decree issued by President Vladimir V. Putin prevents Russian companies like the natural gas giant Gazprom from providing foreign regulators with information without Kremlin approval.
abstract: President Vladimir V Putin of Russia issues a decree that effectively prohibits Gazprom, the state natural gas giant, from cooperating with European Union investigators trying to build an antitrust case against it; decree prevents strategically important companies that do business overseas, a category that includes Gazprom, from providing information to foreign regulators without approval from the Kremlin.
lead_paragraph: A decree issued by President Vladimir V. Putin prevents Russian companies like the natural gas giant Gazprom from providing foreign regulators with information without Kremlin approval.

headline.seo: Russia Impedes Inquiry of Fuel Supplier Gazprom
headline.main: Putin Impedes European Inquiry of State Fuel Supplier
headline.print_headline: Putin Impedes European Inquiry of State Fuel Supplier
